title: Hadi Bargizar
text:
Hadi Bargizar (Persian: هادی برگی‌زر) (born 1970 in <a href="Gonbad-e%20Qabus%20%28city%29">Gonbad-e Kavus</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>) is a retired <a href="Iran">Iran</a>ian <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player. After he retired he managed several clubs including <a href="F.C.%20Aboomoslem">F.C. Aboomoslem</a>, <a href="Payam%20Mashhad">Payam Mashhad</a>, <a href="Etka%20Gorgan%20F.C.">Etka Gorgan F.C.</a> and <a href="Gostaresh%20Foolad%20F.C.">Gostaresh Foolad F.C.</a>.
He is an ethnic <a href="Turkmen%20people">Turkmen</a> and older brother of <a href="Morteza%20Bargizar">Morteza Bargizar</a>. Although he was born in <a href="Gonbad-e%20Qabus%20%28city%29">Gonbad-e Kavus</a>, he has lived in <a href="Mashhad">Mashhad</a> since his early childhood.
Playing career.
He played for <a href="F.C.%20Aboomoslem">F.C. Aboomoslem</a> and <a href="Payam%20Mashhad">Payam Mashhad</a> throughout the 1980s and 1990s. He also represented Khorasan Provincial Team in the 1980s and 1990s at senior and youth levels.
Managerial career.
He has coached <a href="F.C.%20Aboomoslem">F.C. Aboomoslem</a>, <a href="Payam%20Mashhad">Payam Mashhad</a> and <a href="Etka%20Gorgan%20F.C.">Etka Gorgan F.C.</a>.
